title: Oriana Gothic skin has a visual bug
body:
Basically that thing Gothic Orianna has around her neck goes through her head when she has her Ball equipped and she gets a lighter color tone than she is supposed to, however when  she unequips the Ball the thing around her neck goes back to normal and her color tone too.
   1. Normally walk through the map, bug in her neck thing and color tone is buged
   2. Unequipp the Ball and the skin goes back to normal.
I would gladly apreciate if you fixed this cause i really love this skin, i hope im posting on correct place :)

replies.body:
Hiya!

Thanks for the report! We're hoping to have this fixed for next patch. :]
